content: I have a cable internet connection with XYZ Communications as my ISP. There are around 5 devices connected to my network, including my laptop, tablet, smart TV, and two smartphones. I've noticed that the slowness is pretty consistent throughout the day, but it's more noticeable when multiple devices are connected at the same time. I did run a speed test on Speedtest.net and got results of around 20 Mbps download and 5 Mbps upload, which is slower than what I'm supposed to get according to my plan. I'm using a router that's about 2 years old, and I haven't made any recent changes to my network setup. By the way, I was having some issues with my laptop's Wi-Fi adapter recently, but I fixed it by updating the network drivers - I'm hoping that's not related to the slow internet.
